11.title: Kim

choices: Kim's boyfriend has come to take her out for dinner
113.content:
Kim could not explain it but lately, she was eating alot more especialy since she had quit the highschool cheerleading team. she sat on the sofa, straining to scrape the remains of nutella left in the jar into her greedy mouth. At that moment her mum came into the living room glairing at kim and exclamed "GET UP YOU LITTLE WORM!" and gave kim a lecture on how by throwing away her figure Kim was ruining her future.

Kim just sat there and ignored her mother while she dug into her 5th pot of nutella, just then there was a knock on the door
113.title: Bigger Appetite

1131.content: She opened the door to find the pizza man with 2 large pizzas already paid for by a strange benefactor. She dug in, her belly was getting larger, bit by bit. after the first pizza, Kim let out a massive belch in relief and a button popped off her pants, she looked down at where the button was and all she could see was her massive stomach.
1131.title: pizza delivery

1132.content:
"Hi gorgious" said Brett as kim greeted him, he glanced momentarily at Kim's growing middle and felt a sudden rush of pleasure, his dream was coming true.
"so then babe where d'ya wanna go?"
1132.title: Kim's boyfriend has come to take her out fo...

114.content: Kim was always a big eater, but her high metabolism and cheerleading kept her in shape. Recently her metabolism has gone down, but not her appetite, and since she was on break the calories she normally ate but used up cheerleading stared piling up. 5 days after break started she had gained 13 pounds, turning her once petite stomach to a small, hard, bloated pouch of fat.
114.title: Slower Metabolism

1141.content: No one notices the small gain. Kim's parents always knew about Kim's big appetite, so they don't say anything when she eats a lot. Kim keeps eating more and more everyday. In 4 days she has gained 10 more pounds, turning her belly pouch into a 2 month pregnant belly.
1141.title: No one notices.

15.title: Other Girls

151.content: Fiona was a beautiful model for Teen Style Magazine. She was the epitome of perfection. Her naturally auburn hair complimented her flawless skin. Being a model she rarely ate and being over six foot tall is very underweight. After one particularly good year she decides to take a brake and relax. As she leaves the modeling agency she runs into
151.title: Fiona

1511.content:
"Hey Fiona where are you off to?" Said Tiana

"I'm going home for a break" answered Fiona

"Nice. Say do you think you could do me a favor Fiona?" Asked Tiana

"Sure what is it." Replied Fiona

"My cousin's moving in with us and he needs someone nice to hang out with. I'd do it but my modeling schedule is very busy right now."
1511.title: Her coworker Tiana

15112.content:
Fiona heard a knock at the door. It was probably Tiana's cousin. Fiona modeled all the time so she never really had any friends of her own. She thought about what her cousin was like. She was so excited to open the door. A teenage boy about 16 stood there. He's looked to be about 300 pounds. He was clearly a nerd as he wore a World of Warcraft t-shirt and keeper a calculator in his pants pocket. His thick framed glasses we nearly as greasy looking as his hair.

"Hi are you Fiona."

She was a little disappointed but thought to be nice anyway. "Yep and what's your name.?"

"I'm Elliot"

"Would you like to come in Elliot" she said somewhat disheartened

He came in and they ended up spending the day together. He was so much nicer than any other boy she knew and they actually had a lot in common.

"I can't believe a girl like you is being so nice to a guy like me."

"Your a pretty cool guy Elliot."

"I could repay you by maybe cooking you a nice dinner" offered Elliot
15112.title: Sure I'd love to

choices: She didn't even notice that she gained 70 pounds
151122.content:
He cooked her a large dinner consisting of spaghetti, garlic bread, salad, soup, and for desert he found a pie that Fiona's mom had gotten earlier that day but never touched. It was the most Fiona's eaten since she started modeling two years earlier when she started high school. It was the best food she'd ever tasted. Elliot was quite the cook. It wasn't long after that Elliot came over everyday to hang out and even made her large lunches and dinners. She didn't always want to eat but just didn't have the heart to refuse. She always told herself that she would for a nice long run after he left but just never did. She didn't think much of she. She never realized how much she was eating and how she was exercising less and less each day as she spent more time with Elliot. He got her hooked on video games like World of Warcraft so even after he was gone she'd play with home online. As the days went one weight slow crept up on her. Her mom didn't like her spending so much time with Elliot but Fiona
Ignored her. Her feelings for Elliot began to change into something different. She couldn't help but think about him all the time. One day he asked her to be his girlfriend and she said yes. This meant they spent even more time together If that was even possible. He even started cooking her larger meals to show his love. Soon her two month break from modeling had come to and end. She was so excited to start doing what she loved again except something was different than before.
151122.title: Sure sounds great

1511221.content: The day came that she went back to the modeling agency for the first time in so long. When she got their she immediately went to change for a photo shoot. She was suppose to wear a purple silk blouse and black dress pants to model for a catalog. When she went to put on her outfit she found that she couldn't even get the pants past her thighs. She was confused. She kept thinking to her self about how she kept dieting and exercising over her break. She gave up on the band and tried the shirt. She was able to get it on all the way when suddenly a button popped. Her stomach has become the largest part of her body. It easily over-hanged by about 5 inches. She never had a gut like this before. She quickly got dressed and ran out of the building. She finally realized that her regular clothes were tightening. She sat down in the street and began to cry. She had been so blind. She kept rationalizing everything she did. All that time she spent with Elliot playing video games and eating really caught up to her. She realized why her mom didn't want her spending so much time with Elliot because she could see the weight gain while Fiona didn't.
1511221.title: She didn't even notice that she gained 70 p...

choices: Fiona begins crying because she's so moved
15112211.content:
She tried very hard to diet and exercise but she loved Elliot too much to not spend time with him or eat his cooking. She had gone from a size 0 to a size 10 in only three months. She had gained another 40 pounds since she quit modeling for good. She asked Elliot one day about what he thought about her weight gain and her said

"I think your just as beautiful now than you were when I first met you maybe even more beautiful. I thought you were going to be mean and stuck up but then I got to know you. All those conversations we've had, all the movies we've seen, monsters we've killed together playing WoW, and every time I made you lunch and dinner I knew you were more of a women than anyone else. You never cared about what I like look like and really compared to me your still thin. I love you all of you Fiona."
15112211.title: A month later

151122111.content: She felt the exact same way. Even though Elliot confronted her she still wanted to lose weight. She was sick of seeing her large gut everyday. Now she couldn't see her feet because it was so large. She thighs had also become like little tree trunks and her butt had grown to be so soft and round. She couldn't even believe that just a few months ago her stomach and butt were firm and tender, her thighs were more than half the size they were now. She still kept gaining weight. When school started again she had no friends except her boyfriend Elliot and a few nerds who hung around them. No one seemed to recognize her anymore and all people seemed to talk about was her massive weight gain. Every day after school her and Elliot would play WoW together or watch anime. He still cooked her a great dinner everyday but now she also ate more junk food than normal. The stress of school was getting to her. Food was now her comfort. She kept swearing that tomorrow she'd diet and excessive again. It never happened though.
151122111.title: I love you too Elliot

1511221111.content:
By the time January came she had given up on trying to lose weight. Her weight had finally matched Elliot's at 300. The holidays were miserable for her. All she go we're disapproving states from her family.her stomach was so big she couldn't even see her feet anymore. Her stomach actually was bigger than Elliot's by this point. She was so embarrassed with her gain that she never wanted to go out anymore. All she would do was go to school and hang out with Elliot at her house. He on the other hand loved her weight gain. He admitted that he was pretty turned off by her body when they first met and loved how she could match his size and especially loved that her stomach was bigger than his. He caressed her large forearms, patted her newly formed double chin, grabbed her rather large love handles and kissed her passionately.

"You are my perfect girl. You play video games, watch tv, and eat like a pig. I've watched you transform into this amazing new person. I know you wouldn't have been caught dead playing Wow while eating a box of donuts before. You are every geeks dream."

She couldn't believe what she was hearing. She never noticed it but she had become a geek. She loved playing Pokemon and sky rim and of course world of Warcraft. Her new larger wardrobe was full of pants with elastic rims, plaid shirts, and even video game shirts. Even a WoW one just like the one Elliot wore when they met. She poked at the think belly rolls that stuck out from under her shir. She hated her weight gain am still does but she did get an amazing boyfriend from it.

After highschool Fiona and Elliot got married. Her weight stayed at around 300 and she always swore she'd lose it. They eventually had a daughter who grew up to be fat and nerdy like her parents.
1511221111.title: Fast forward several months

153.title: Maybe Kirsten?

1532.content:
Amy: (view last chapter)

Angela: 13 years at a height of 5'6". Burnette weighing 250 lbs. She has been heavy all her life from a metabolism problem and a whopper appetite. She has looked pregnant ever since the beginning of the school year. She is a couch potato and is usually encouraged to gain weight. Big breasts and an equally large butt make guys like her more. Her school happens to have the most pregnant teens in the country and is getting close to having the most pregnant girls in the world.

Courtney: 14 years and 110 lbs. At 5'9" Courtney is a very much a likable girl. Her life has been half super model half school clown. She is a very intelligent girl who has a bit of a want for reproduction. Her bust is a dd cup and her butt is 6 inches radius per cheek. Guys ask her out everyday and some have tried to get her to gain weight. Her power over the guys has made her able to command all single guys.
1532.title: Amy, Angela, and Cortney

choices: After school she went to the uniform shop.
After school she went to the town library.
15322.content:
"When are you due?" Julie asked suddenly, interrupting the conversation about schoolwork.

"The assignment's due tomorrow," Julie replied with a worried tone in her voice, "and I am fretting that I am not going to have it done in time."

"No, silly," her classmate sighed, "when is your baby due?"

"What baby?" Angela looked confused. "Am I supposed to have one?"

"Well, no," the other girl said, leaning heavily on Angela's table, "but I thought you were going to."

"No, I'm not," Angela said, surprised. "I wouldn't even know where to get one. Why did you think I would?"

"Well," the schoolgirl began, rubbing a hand over her belly, "you've been getting pretty big this year, like me, and I am going to have a baby. So I figured that you were too."

"Do you need to be bigger to have a baby?" The thirteen year-old girl's eyes widened.

"Kind of. It turns out that I am getting bigger because the baby is growing inside my belly."

"Oh, pull the other one."

"No, really. I know I look like I am getting fat, but in actual fact my body is filling up with a baby."

"Is that normal?"

Julie shrugged. "Apparantly."

"So, how did it get in there?"

"I don't know. The grownups won't tell me, but Marcy reckons it is from kissing boys."

"Pfft. I've done that lots of times, and far more interesting things besides. There's no baby inside of me."

Julie raised an eyebrow. "How would you know? Until just now you did not even know babies grew inside girls."

"Oh? Just girls?"

"Apparantly."

"So, what do the boys do then?"

"As it turns out, chase after me more the bigger I get."

Angela nodded with a measure of understanding. This year she had little trouble getting attention from the boys when she wanted it. It had never occurred to her that it was her size and shape that attracted them. She had always been on the plump side, but a healthy appetite and a love of video games had added some weight to her body in recent months and showing no signs of stopping.

"So," Angela said, echoing Julie's earlier question, "when are you due?" Apparantly that was the right way to say it.

"In about three months," her classmate replied, rubbing her belly.

"So, is this getting your work done?" Mister Jones demanded sternly from behind them, startling them. The background buzz of students talking continued unabated.

"Uh, no sir. Julie just told me the strangest thing and I had to know more."

"Did she?"

"Yes sir. She says there is a baby growing inside her body."

"Yes," their teacher sighed. "It would appear so."

"Is that normal?"

"That depends on what you mean by 'normal'. Is that how it works? Yes. That's normal. A lot of girls here at this school have babies growing inside them right now, so you could say that's normal too. Some don't know it, and the rest do not really talk about it. Their own friends may not be aware what is happening to them."

"So how do we get a baby inside us?" Julie asked. "No-one will tell me."

Mister Jones sighed deeply. "I am not allowed to tell you. Even giving you hints could get me fired."

"What do you mean?" asked Angela.

"The state government banned us from teaching or explaining to students how to prevent a baby starting in your body apart from telling you not to do whatever it is that does it. The school board went one further and forbid us from telling you in any detail what that act is. Apparantly someone on the PTA kicked up a huge fuss that it was immoral to discuss it with minors. All that we teachers can say is, whatever it is don't do it."

"That's silly."

"That's life. Sometimes people with the authority to make decisions that affect others make the wrong choice and the others have to endure the consequences. So now we cannot discuss in any way some very important details about how your bodies work. And if the rules get any stricter I won't even be allowed to tell students that I am not permitted to tell them."

"That's crazy," insisted Angela.

"Yes, it is," agreed the teacher. "Now if you'll excuse me I have to go and pretend to rouse on more students."


When the class ended the teenagers all headed to lunch. As Angela made her way through the milling crowd she paid attention to just how many girls had been putting on weight lately. She estimated that at least one in twenty were noticeably heavier than when they started the school year, but she could not be sure if that meant they had a baby growing inside them. For all she knew they were big eaters like herself. Some of them, she began to realise, were wearing special uniforms. They were similar to the standard uniform, but shaped differently to allow for larger bodies. Was this another clue?

She considered her own uniform. It was tight on her in many places, especially across her belly. Maybe one of those big girl uniforms would be a good idea. This one was never a perfect fit - she was fairly tall for her age and did carry some extra weight - but it was becoming more constricting as the year went on.

When she had acquired a sizeable meal on her tray she sat down at a nearby table and was quickly joined by a couple of boys she was fond of. She graciously allowed them to feed her lunch to her while she kept her hands under the table. When the meal was over she kissed them both on the lips and left the table, chuckling to herself that she doubted that would have started a baby growing in her.

She had to admit, though, her uniform did feel rather full.
15322.title: Angela

choices: A skin tight but stretchy uniform
A uniform that was loose but her size
153221.content: Angela was so uncomfortable in her uniform that she went to the uniform shop after she changed at home. Knowing that she might have a baby in her soon she might as well get a uniform that conforms to her body. She went to costumer service desk for help and the person there whose belly and breasts were giant pointed to the maternity section. When she got over there she had to decide between...
